title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: If the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is still always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Open a Java file.
5. Right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
6. Verify that the "Build" action is still enabled even though automatic build is enabled.
